definition[0]: the process of entering another country in order to live there permanently
example[0]: He called for a common European policy on immigration.
definition[1]: the total number of people who immigrate
definition[2]: the place at an airport, sea port etc where officials check the documents of everyone entering the country
definition[3]: the process of entering another country, state etc in order to live there
example[2]: In the past, California has had the highest rate of immigration.
definition[4]: the place at an airport, port etc where officials check the documents of people entering the country
